meanings.sent1: Wearing jeans and a t-shirt is an ordinaries outfit for him.

meanings.definition: A type of charge or fee
meanings.sent1: The hotel bill included various ordinaries for room service and amenities.
meanings.sent2: The parking ticket had an ordinaries fee for exceeding the time limit.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly complained about the ordinaries he had to pay for using the public restroom.

meanings.definition: A type of heraldic charge consisting of narrow vertical stripes
meanings.sent1: The shield displayed an ordinaries of red and white stripes.
